We are currently looking for Area / Regional  Sales Manager -B2B for Agro Chemical SegmentLocation:  Nasik  Satana , Dindori , Pimpalgaon Baswant , Adgaon, Hyderabad Kolkata , Indore Raipur, Maharastra , Andra Pradesh Industry: Agro chemical / Fertilizer / Pesticides Qualification: GraduationProfile& Experience: Looking for 3+ Years of Experience in Agro Chemical products B2B Sale in particular Region.Should be driven, someone who can take initiative and lead a teamJob Description:1. Setting up Supply Chain & Distribution4. Contribute in the development and execution of customer & sales strategies to grow the Products Portfolio5. Develops strong win-win relationships with distributors and key retailers in the market9.Actively listens to Channel Partner and Trade partners ' feedback and takes necessary action to improve overall quality of service to our partners10.Understands business and is able to create & execute growth plans through systematic planning & organising11.Identifies & quantify 'sources of growth' and build plans accordingly (Focus Areas & Enablers, Annual Plan)12. Identifies trends from the data, correlate business growth with market intelligence and come out with required inferences14:Leading, supervising and controlling his team of Sales Officers for the implementation of the growth agenda in the area through the opportunities addressed by: - Key Geography Key Channels - Key People - Key CategoriesJob Offer:Fast track growthThe person will be working closely with the promoter and CEO and will be involved in/ exposed to various aspects of the business and strategy from the initial stagesLooking for energetic and passionate team members who are willing to work in the entrepreneurial working environment.Given the nature of responsibilities, there is a certain amount of fluidity in roles and responsibilities and candidates should only apply if they are comfortable with rapid growth and changing scenarios and willing to contribute to the growth of the businessIntersted candidates pls share resume on ac.aksshat@gmail.com , 8469488833 / 7574988809 Thanks & RegardsHiring Team

column2: Role Description Driving business of existing and to-be-launched (-2 years to +3 years) Products across Crops through Marketing interventions / strategies thereby supporting achievement of Product-wise Sales across India by taking FMMs on board to drive their respective product portfolio in a targeted divisional level.Responsibilities:  Portfolio Vision and Roadmap: Analyze the trend of market and present a roadmap based on gap in current product portfolio to cater the need of the end customer and help organization achieve a complete products bouquet. This KRA in turn assures that the voice of the market is heard and heeded by the management of the organizationGTM (Go to Market) Strategy for Core Products and Implementations: Develop and curate go to market strategies for products that contribute major share in the gross margin of the company. Assure execution of the strategies by key internal stakeholders for proper implementation and outcome. GTM Strategies includes Product launch and creative branding strategies as well as market analytics to emphasize on the scope and strength of the product. Implementation also comprises of, steering the proper execution and delivery of the positioning and branding strategies by the internal stakeholders to the end customer.Training Program for the Frontline Internal Stakeholders: Design internal training program for the frontline team members to ensure proper delivery of positioning and marketing strategies to the end customer. This also serves as an internal resource techno-commercial skill development program and ensures that similar reflection of the organization is portrayed amongst the end customersLiquidation Strategies  Special tools for Liquidation: Gearing up internal stakeholders with innovative strategies to onboard or attract the target audience that ensures liquidation of the product. Providing creative, physical, commercial, and digital branding tools to drive liquidation for products that contribute good share towards the gross margin and is profitable for the organizationCross-Departmental Coordination for Product Availability and Salability: This KRA involves Co-ordinating with multiple stakeholders for all actions required prior to product launch/placement, including but not limited to R&D Team, Supply Chain, Compliance, Regulatory, Design and others. Educational & Training Requirements:       B.Sc/M.Sc./MBA Agriculture  or related sciences with proven experience Knowledge, Experience and Skills: Proven experience in related fields Other Requirements: Good command on MS Office, Report Making etc.

column1: Head Mechanical - Fertilizer(Lagos/ Nigeria/ West Africa)
column2: Role & responsibilities  Extending timely support to Operations and other functions within Fertilizer during project and operation phases  Project phase:Timely completion of all mechanical related project activities including engineering, procurement, construction, pre-commissioning and commissioning.Reviewing Technical & Engineering Specifications, Equipment Datasheets, PIDs, Equipment & Piping Layouts, Equipment Inspection & Test Plans, Piping Line lists, Isometrics, Support drawings, 3D model, etc. for detailed engineering phase of the Project.Participate in HAZOP, etc.Review of Tender documents, Procurement specifications, Commissioning, Capital & 2-years Spare parts lists, Technical calculations as necessary, for equipment & piping.Supervision of the Construction, Pre-commissioning and commissioning activities of Mechanical equipment (Rotating & Static Equipment), Ancillaries and Piping.Project Progress monitoring and initiate necessary actions to meet the project completion schedules.Mechanical Inspections & clearance of equipment and piping during various stages of the project.Support in controlling effluents and emissions discharges, , project waste discharges. Develop, implement and comply to the project procedures.Operations Phase:Ensure effective Maintenance of Mechanical equipment & Piping of the plantPreventive, Predictive, Corrective Maintenance and trouble shooting.Technical Decision making on Plant Equipment as and when required.Optimum Inventory of Spares & Consumables.Development and implementation of CMMS (Centralized Maintenance Management System)Procurement of equipment, spares, items as necessary and inspections of the same.Preparation of Scope of works for Service Contracts, tendering, review of contract bids, Contract awarding and implementation.Day-to-day coordination with user sections for prioritising scheduled and un-scheduled maintenance activitiesShutdown & Plant Turnaround Planning and Execution.Ensure and maintain safe working practices and procedures in the section.Support in controlling effluents and emissions dischargesMaintenance Performance monitoring and improvement.Suggest and follow-up on improvements.Develop, implement and comply to the procedures.Other responsibilities:Develop and implement the best maintenance management systems & practices.Prepare MIS reports and other non-routine reports, as required.Develop, implement and comply to the management systems with respect to Quality, Health, Safety, Environment. Preferred candidate profile Mechanical Engineering graduate with 15+ years of relevant experience in Fertilizer industries.Competent in Engineering and maintenance aspects of:Static equipment such as Reformer, Ammonia Converter, Heat Exchangers, Pressure Vessels, Columns, etc.Refractory applicationRotary equipment such as Turbines, Compressors, multi-stage pumps, centrifugal & reciprocating pumps, fans, blowers, etc.MMSMaterial handling equipment such as conveyors, reclaimer, ship loader, bagging machines, etc.Different types of materials used in fertilizer industry, their welding processes along with the filler materials and electrodes.Lifting practices, Tools & appliances used in the fertilizer IndustryCodes and Standards like API, ASME, ASTM, NACE, TEMA, etc.3D modelUnderstanding of HAZOP and QRATrouble shooting:Should have basic idea of design criteria, working principle, application for different types of rotary equipment used in process plant.Should have knowledge of RCA methodologies to analyse & co-relate observations to evolve solution.Cost optimization:Should be familiar with budget preparation and optimization  Please forward your updated profile to Sakthi.Paramanick@energy-mgt.com along with your current/ expected CTC details and notice period.Perks and benefits Best in Industry Standards
column13: Engineering, Procurement, Pre-commissioning, Mechanical Maintenance, Commissioning

column2: Candidate must be having working knowledge of Tally (entries i.e. Sales, Purchase, GST, Receipt & Payment Entries, Bank Reconciliation, etc.) Also of MS office & should have  basic knowledge of TDS, GST(GSTR1, GSTR3B, GST Reconciliation etc)
column11: B.Com in Commerce, M.Com in Commerce
column13: Tally Prime, TDS, Accounting, Gst Reconciliation, Gst Return, Accounts Reconciliation, Accounts, Gst Filling

column1: Sr. Executive/ Asst Manager Supply Chain
column2: Planning the delivery and dispatch of goods. Dispatch planning on a daily basis and Handling of the Dispatch team. Prepare Sales orders and create Invoices through SAP/TCS. On-Time Dispatch DO Wise/PO Wise. Preparation of Challans and Handling of logistics.    Making DO sheet Dispatch of material as per DO schedule. Handling of logistics and Coordinate with PPC. Inventory control for raw material and finished goods. FG stock physically checks on a daily basis. Maintain the Inventory of all types of Materials in F G. Should be Proficient Skilled in Identifying Resolving Material Issues.    Supervise all activities in the Warehouse in the form of dispatch of goods. Maintain The Material Stock on FIFO and LIFO Basis. Take all Safety Precaution in Plant Area. Must be able to handle suppliers Transporter.     Qualification     Graduate with experience in manufacturing company Desirable Attributes Must have experience working in a manufacturing company and must be ready to work in shifts
column13: Supervisor, PPC, Warehouse, SAP, Executive, Inventory control, Assistant Manager Supply Chain, Raw material, dispatch planning, Logistics
